thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1818
thread.title: Ashlee

author: Ashlee
title: Ashlee
text: I was able to find a flight from Tampa to Seattle for $367 which was by far the cheapest ticket I could find. The only thing I didn't like is that I would have been charged to choose my seat ahead of time. I will be flying American and I'm almost certain you are not charged for this when booking directly with American. Even with this additional cost, my ticket was still much more affordable.
